description: Rein uses playing cards as her weapon and is a childhood friend of Sayuri. The Hida family took her in after her father disappeared. She enjoys playing card games and does not mind gambling. Rein also has a love of words, and many times she is heard speaking a sentence using one word and splitting it three ways though they all mean the same thing, such as when she called Sayuri "an idiot, a moron, and a complete dingdong".
name: Tsunomoto Rein
